sentences.en: B Note the position of the words in italics in these sentences.
sentences.cn: 注意以下句子中用斜体印出的词的位置.

sentences.en: Examples in this dictionary are in italics.
sentences.cn: 本词典中的例子用斜体显示。

sentences.en: Examples in this dictionary are in italics.
sentences.cn: 本词典中的示例均为斜体字.

sentences.en: Find the words and phrases in the boxthe same meaning thein italics.
sentences.cn: 找和斜体字的相同字的意义和片语.然后重写句子.

sentences.en: I quote the passage; the Italics are mine.
sentences.cn: 我引用这一节, 着重点是我加上的.

sentences.en: In the document were used in italics and so many other fonts.
sentences.cn: 在文档分别使用的楷体、宋体等其他多种字体.

sentences.en: Italics are chiefly used to indicate emphasis, a foreign word, etc.
sentences.cn: 斜体字主要用以表示强调 、 外国字等等.

sentences.en: Names of objects in the standard library , however, are presented in italics.
sentences.cn: 但是, 标准库中的对象名用斜体表示.

sentences.en: New terms are in italics the first time they are used.
sentences.cn: 新的专门用语在它熬头次浮现时用斜体字来夸大.

sentences.en: Should bolding be applied first and then italics?
sentences.cn: 是否应先应用粗体后应用斜体？

sentences.en: Suggested questions to elucidate understanding are given in black in italics.
sentences.cn: 为表明理解,推荐给研究人员的询问用黑色斜体字.

sentences.en: The above definition is set in roman ; this example is in italics.
sentences.cn: 上面的定义用的是 正体 字排印的,本例句用的是斜体.

sentences.en: The changes are denoted in both BLUE and ITALICS.
sentences.cn: 这些变化都被记在蓝光和斜体中.

sentences.en: The special values within API syntax examples are shown in italics.
sentences.cn: 在API语法中一些特定的参数用斜体表示.

sentences.en: This doesn't mean, however, that whenever you want to have something in bold or italics you should shoehorn it into these two tags.
sentences.cn: 但这并不意味着只要您想使某些内容变成粗体或斜体，就应该将它们硬塞进这两个标记中。

sentences.en: Use mine, yours, his or hers in place of the words in italics.
sentences.cn: 用mine, yours, his或hers替换斜体字.

trans.tran_cn: 斜体，斜体字，斜体字( italic的名词复数 )
trans.tran_en: a type of printed letters that lean to the right, often used to emphasize particular words
